altername_name: Adventure 2: The Case of the Scarce Scarab
name: Quaddle Family Mysteries 2: The Case of the Scarce Scarab: Garden
overview: Your child is invited inside the fascinating Quaddle Museum to help investigate the case of the missing ancient scarab earring. Solving mathematical puzzles and problems in the museum's various rooms will provide clues to the earring's location. LEARNING OBJECTIVES Applying measurement to problem-solving situations Estimate by using nonstandard units of length Use a measurement tool to interpret information from a chart Use units of measure to count or compute length, perimeter, and area Use a nonstandard unit of measure to calculate distance
